definition: chicken cholera (caused by Pasteurella multocida or P. avicida)/fowl cholera
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary

sentences.english: One of his assistants was careless about a culture of chicken cholera germs.
sentences.chinese: 他的一位助手對一組雞霍亂培養菌漠不關心。
